name: avant-garde lamp
description: A modern masterpiece that combines cutting-edge design with functionality. This avant-garde lamp features sleek lines and innovative lighting technology, perfect for creating a contemporary atmosphere in any room.

name: chic chair
description: Elevate your living space with this chic chair that blends comfort with style. The ergonomic design ensures optimal seating while the modern aesthetic makes it a statement piece in any room.

name: comfy bed
description: Experience the ultimate in comfort with this plush bed. Designed for maximum relaxation, it features premium materials and a supportive construction that ensures a perfect night's sleep every time.

name: contemporary sofa
description: A modern sofa that redefines living room elegance. With its clean lines and minimalist design, this contemporary sofa offers both style and comfort, making it the perfect centerpiece for your home.
